subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Igor Anton of Spain broke away with three miles left and held on to win the 14th stage of the Giro d’Italia, while Alberto Contador was second to extend his overall lead.
snippet: Igor Anton of Spain broke away with three miles left and held on to win the 14th stage of the Giro d’Italia, while Alberto Contador was second to extend his overall lead.
